reviews.productTitle: Amico 6 Pack Dimmer Light Switch, Single-Pole or 3-Way Slide Dimmer Switches for Led Lights, Suitable for 150W Dimmable LED/CFL Lights and 600W Incandescent/Halogen, Wall Plate Included, White
reviews.text: When we buy a house, we always change out all the switches. These are my go to, and I Have always been happy I am elated that these were one I could select from. If you read a review that says that their light flickers it’s because they’re not using the appropriate lightbulbs. You need to look on the box to make sure they are dimmable or not. It’s not the fault of the switch! Do not hesitate, these are awesome and for them to include the plates is very cost-effective. They look beautiful and finished!
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2024
reviews.title: Works like a charm

reviews.productTitle: Amico 6 Pack Dimmer Light Switch, Single-Pole or 3-Way Slide Dimmer Switches for Led Lights, Suitable for 150W Dimmable LED/CFL Lights and 600W Incandescent/Halogen, Wall Plate Included, White
reviews.text: These are high quality single pole or 3-way compatible slide dimmer switches that are made well and come with their matching plate covers. The hardware is also included along with an instructional installation booklet. The dimmer switches remember their settings…once you set them then turn off the switch with the paddle toggle and go to turn it back on it returns to the setting where you last used it ingeniously retaining that last setting. Very convenient where you don’t have to constantly adjust them back to the level you prefer. They are Flicker free and offer silent dimming so there’s no humming noises with these at all. They are Compatible with most bulbs on the market including CFL, incandescent and LED types per the manufacturer…I’m using them with LED lights so I have no way to test the others. Excellent value in this quantity 6 pack, very nice!
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on September 7, 2024
reviews.title: 6 Pack Slide dimmers
